POP-UP

Welcome to bulltown.neo, the neocities’ offspring of bulltown.2022 - a remix of words and images, circa 1997-2004 and other works created in the same spirit.

Frequent updates - may need clear your cache. Mi casa, su casa.

GIF animation is OFF by default (except on mouse hover).

𝗯𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘁𝗼𝘄𝗻.𝗻𝗲𝗼 𝗯𝗹𝗼𝗴

animated buttons when paused

You’ve probably noticed animations are turned off by default on this site. I use freezeframe.js to allow site visitors to turn animations on or off and decided to leave that choice up to each visitor.

When animations are turned off, only the first frame of an animated .gif file appears. If the name of the site is not present on that first frame, the button appears to be blank (unless hovered). While that may be an intentional design choice on the part of the button’s creator, I’m mentioning it only to be helpful to button creators who may not be aware of how freezeframe and similar solutions render buttons when animations are turned off.

The simple way to see a button’s animation when animations are turned off is to hover your mouse over the button.

-joe jenett

(cross-posted to mastodon)

Feb 5, 2025 • joe jenett
